name: Arabica Washed Bulk Green Beans
description:
• Enjoy the ultimate farm-to-cup experience with the nuanced flavours of coffee beans from our estate nestled in the verdant, misty hills of the Bababudangiri Range in Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka.

  • Baarbara Green Coffee Beans are ground form of natural, new and untreated coffee beans. Due to the presence of chlorogenic acids, Green Coffee results in weight loss with proper diet and exercise regime. It acts as a great natural detoxifier and helps boost your immunity and metabolism.

    • Our 1 kg offerings are ideal for stocking up your office pantry or for coffee machines at any food retail outlet.Â 

    • SHELF LIFE: 12 months from the date of manufacture.
